entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
